analysis.description:
RefundVault.refund (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#686-700) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- investor.transfer(depositedValue) (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#697-699)

Crowdsale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#1174-1181) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallets[uint8(Roles.beneficiary)].transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#1180)

AllocationQueue.addShare (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#860-881) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == totalShare.add(_tokens))

Crowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#1244-1293) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- stopTime == 0

Crowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#1244-1293) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- stopTime == 0
Crowdsale.validPurchase (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#1182-1194) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- withinPeriod = (now > startTime && stopTime == 0)

Reentrancy in AllocationQueue.addShare (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#860-881):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == totalShare.add(_tokens)) (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#865-866)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalShare (/unique_chucks/17/0x2690402e8d303c1ca4eceff9e17c85dd7383ef47.sol#878-881)
